EmailTemplate.name: 12 Days of DealChicken- Newspaper Markets
EmailTemplate.subject: DealChicken's Gift to You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
12 Days of DealChicken is your ticket to online holiday spending. During the holiday spending rush, it's hard to set yourself apart from the crowd. Stakes are high for businesses. Holiday spending can represent 20-40% of annual sales for some merchants according to the National Retail Federation. Let DealChicken be your ticket to the shopping frenzy.
From December 2-15th DealChicken will showcase a new local merchant daily. For more information, download our 12 Days of DealChicken information sheet.
To reserve one of 12 featured positions, contact {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} by Nov. 15th at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your location or website. Merchants receive a revenue split less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
Why try DealChicken? Hear how DealChicken increased brand awareness & website traffic for a specialty retailer.
